mapper.insert: insert into article (aid, atitle, uid, addtime, readnumber, state, isbanner, category, source, keyword, author, acontent, coverimg, brief) values (#{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{atitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isbanner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acontent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{coverimg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{brief,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.insert: insert into article (acontent, atitle, brief) values (#{acontent}, #{atitle}, #{brief})
mapper.select: select atitle, brief from article where atitle like concat('%', #{condition}, '%') and state = 2
mapper.update: update article set state = #{state} where aid = #{aid}
